column1: Entries flagged for review (short list)
Adventure Vehicle Trail
BG: Път за офроуд — non‑native phrasing. Suggest: Офроуд пътека or Теренна пътека.
Field Hockey Ground / Club
RO: Teren hockey pe iarbă / Club de hockey pe iarbă — English hockey should be Romanian hochei → Teren de hochei pe iarbă, Club de hochei pe iarbă.
Mountain Bike Trail
RO: Traseu mountain-bike → prefer Traseu de mountain-bike or Traseu de bicicletă montană.
Parkway
RO: Parkway (and BG/SR variants). Consider local label Promenadă (or keep as-is if you prefer English).
Salad Bar
RO: Salad bar → Bar de salate
BG: Салат бар → consider Бар за салати
Sandwich Restaurant
RO: Restaurant sandwich → consider Sandwicherie or Restaurant de sandwich‑uri
Shanghainese Restaurant
RO: Restaurant shanghaiez → typo; suggest Restaurant shanghainez or Restaurant din Shanghai
Music and Video Rental Shop
RO: Închiriere muzică/video → prefer Închiriere muzică și video
Wine Bar
RO: Wine bar → Bar de vinuri
Drive Through Bottle Shop
RO: Magazin drive-through de băuturi → optional: Magazin drive‑through de băuturi alcoolice for clarity
Canoe Club
SR: Клуб кану/Кајак → prefer Клуб за кајак и кану (no slash)
Fast Food Restaurant
RO: Fast-food — consistent, but consider Restaurant fast‑food if you prefer a noun phrase
